KSP Buka Lowongan Pekerjaan
07 Nov 2019, 16:52 by Pradipta Rahadi


KSP Buka Lowongan Pekerjaan

KBRN, Jakarta : Kantor Staff Presiden kini membuka lapangan kerja. Kepala Staff Presiden Moeldoko, di kantornya pada Kamis (07/11/19) menjelaskan, saat ini timnya sudah menyiapkan tim khusus SDM untuk melakukan seleksi pegawai KSP. 
"Kami membuka pintu, siapa pun bisa mendaftar disini. Dan kita sudah siapkan tim SDM untuk seleksinya." Jelas Moeldoko.
Menurut Moeldoko, Presiden Joko Widodo memberi tugas tambahan kepada KSP. Tugas tersebut yaitu delivery unit atau unit penyampaian, dimana mereka nanti bertugas memastikan program pemerintahan Presiden Joko Widodo berjalan dengan baik dan benar-benar terlaksana. Bahkan jika ada halangan, maka akan ada pemeriksaan intensif untuk memeriksa pokok permasalahan.  
"Ada tambahan tugas, delivery unit. Tim delivery yang bisa memastikan bukan hanya 'sent' tapi juga telah ter-deliver dengan baik. Keinginan Presiden bisa diwujudkan, bisa dioperasionalkan. Kalau terjadi bottleneck, kita nanti akan periksa." Ujar mantan Panglima TNI itu serius. 
Selain itu, perbedaan yang akan paling menyorot perhatian dari KSP yang baru yaitu akan adanya seorang wakil KSP, yang akan membantu Kepala Staff Kepresidenan, Moeldoko. Moeldoko menjelaskan, saat ini Peraturan Presiden yang baru mengenai Kantor Staff Presiden masih disusun. 
Moeldoko mengatakan, penambahan posisi wakil KSP ini karena pertimbangan beban kerja.

KSP Open Job Vacancies
Nov 7 2019, 16:52 by Pradipta Rahadi


KSP Open Job Vacancies

KBRN, Jakarta: The Presidential Staff Office is now opening employment. Chief of Staff of President Moeldoko, in his office on Thursday (11/7/19) explained, currently his team has prepared a special HR team to conduct KSP employee selection.
"We open the door, anyone can register here. And we have prepared an HR team for selection." Moeldoko explained.
According to Moeldoko, President Joko Widodo gave an additional task to KSP. The task is the delivery unit or delivery unit, where they will later be tasked with ensuring President Joko Widodo's administration program runs well and is truly implemented. Even if there are obstacles, there will be an intensive examination to examine the subject matter.
"There are additional tasks, a delivery unit. A delivery team that can ensure that it is not only 'sent' but has also been delivered well. The President's wish can be realized, it can be operational. If a bottleneck occurs, we will check later." Said the former TNI Commander seriously.
In addition, the difference that will highlight the attention of the new KSP is that there will be a KSP representative, who will help the Presidential Chief of Staff, Moeldoko. Moeldoko explained that currently the new Presidential Regulation regarding the Presidential Staff Office is still being drafted.
Moeldoko said that the addition of the KSP representative position was due to workload considerations.
